overview:
Ivan is a veteran web producer with expertise in project management, web technolgies & architecture, UI design, SEO, online marketing and Google Adwords.

In 2006, he co-founded Flixya Entertainment, LLC an online media network serving millions of viewers worldwide.

In 2010, he co-founded Custom SLR, LLC with the help of crowd funding site Kickstarter. Custom SLR specializes in innovative camera gear including the C-Loop Strap Mount and Split Strap which were featured in Engadget, CrunchGear and Wired Magazine.

Ivan holds a Masters in Electrical Engineering from USC and a Bachelors in Electrical Engineering with a Minor in Economics from the University of California at San Diego. As an electrical engineer, Ivan has a background in image processing, wireless communications, semiconductor memories, and IP. When not in front of the computer, Ivan is out shooting photos and traveling the world.

degrees.subject: Electrical Engineering - Multimedia and Creative Technologies
